messages.subject: Intro. and advice please (long)
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome to the list! Here s the site of an Aussie that has written extensively about the insanity of Australia s homeschool laws and also has an Australian
messages.messageBody:
Welcome to the list!

Here's the site of an Aussie that has written extensively about the
insanity of Australia's homeschool laws and also has an Australian
support list. She's an unschooler:
http://www.geocities.com/adelecarrall/

I bet you'll find lots of help there on how to deal with the
Australian authorities and just what your rights are.

Also, there's another lady from Oz at unschooling.com message
boards. I haven't seen her there for a while, but Neri is a sweet
sould with six children that has navigated unschooling life through
all the laws and regulations. She's also had some of her children in
school, so she's probably very up on all the laws over there.

Ren
